1175970.name: Hibiscus Red
1175970.description:
Hibiscus Red | Part 1: Voices from beyond


In the first part of this new adventure game series Hibiscus discovers the shocking truth about his father and sets out on a journey to save his family and the world. Or is it worlds?

Features:
  • Almost classic point and click adventure game
  • Part 1 of 4 with around 40 minutes of gameplay
  • Multi-language support: English and german texts
  • Text-to-speech option for english language.
  • No hint mechanics, so not so easy I guess, yes it's a feature!
1175970.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
